channel.title: Legion - Free Chaotic | Fun | 30+ Players | Good Community
channel.description:
[FONT=Trebuchet MS] [CENTER][SIZE=32pt][COLOR=red]Legion[/COLOR][/SIZE] Hello and welcome to my advertisement. I present to you Legion. Legion is a very fun server that promises you a good time. We are a dedicated team and we hope to bring a server that is actually fun. And we defenetly hope to see you soon. [COLOR=red]Main Links[/COLOR]
[ul][*]Play Now - [url=http://legionps.com/Legion.jar]Legion.jar[/url] [*]Forums - [url=http://legionps.com/forums/]Invision Power Board[/url] [*]Website - [url=http://legionps.com/]Legion - Free Chaotic Weapon[/url] [*]Webclient - [url=http://legionps.com/play.html]Project Exile - Webclient[/url] [*]Donate - [url=http://legionps.com/donate/donate.php]Legion - Donate[/url][/ul]
Lets just jump to the picture: [img]http://i.imgur.com/aYFJ06g.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KFACSsV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XvccpXU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HHiDw5e.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bEqVVOV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NVM6R4v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fuz5asW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rfckYCE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/djC4duo.png[/img]
[ul][*]Fast money making [*]Good drops [*]Money pouch [*]All specs work 100% [*]Handcannon [*]Dungeoneering [*]Better slayer [*]Most skills 100% [*]Active pking [*]Minigames [*]Tasks [*]Lots of bosses [*]100% Range [*]No Dupes [*]Bank Tabs [*]Dwarve Multi cannon [*]Fun points [*]Fast money m[/ul]
[/CENTER]
[/FONT]

item.title: Legion - Free Chaotic | Fun | 30+ Players | Good Community
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

The server looks good,
I’m not here to flame, but…
There’s so many bugs, and if i were you i’d fix atleast 99% of them if i were you.

you can acc share on runescape?

item.title: Legion - Free Chaotic | Fun | 30+ Players | Good Community
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Out of curiosity why is account sharing a ban’able offence? Even on Runescape it’s not against the rules (anymore).
http://legionps.com/forums/index.php?/topic/356-unban-i-max-out/

P.S. I lolled at you giving yourself 10k posts.

Read full topic

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

No Dupes
false!

oh wait the crack staff explained to me its not a dupe its an item spawn before i was banned. However you need the original item to DUPElicate it.
